title: Google Maps adds more traffic information and new iPhone features
content:
Google Maps is still the best mapping service around, and Google is constantly adding new features. Today the company announced a few changes to how maps are displayed on mobile, as well as a handful of new features exclusively for Apple devices to take advantage of newer iOS functionality. The post Google Maps adds more traffic information and new iPhone features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google Maps is rolling out new traffic and navigation features on all platforms, and iPhone owners get a few extra goodies.
